item.title: 私募股权投资将愤怒的贷款人推到了队伍的末尾
item.description:
公司重组潮正在形成一种阶级制度，使债权人损失数十亿美元。就在经济最需要债务投资者的时候，这对他们是一个新的打击。【原文：

A stampede of restructuring companies is creating a class system that's costing creditors billions. It’s a new blow for debt investors just as the economy needs them most.

】

item.title: 莱维敦美国反深度伪造法案等待总统下笔
item.description:
《取缔法案》在两党支持下获得众议院通过。Levittown 联合主持人奥利维亚-卡维尔（Olivia Carville）将在本期更新节目中讨论该法案。【原文：

The Take It Down Act passed the House with bipartisan support. Levittown co-host Olivia Carville discusses the legislation in this update episode. 

】

item.title: MercadoLibre 在阿根廷的 "惊人 "反弹超出预期
item.description: 电子商务和金融科技巨头 MercadoLibre 公司今年第一季度的业绩超出了分析师的预期，其信贷组合实现了强劲增长，同时，由于阿根廷取消了贸易壁垒和货币管制，该公司在阿根廷的业务也得到了提升。【原文：E-commerce and fintech giant MercadoLibre Inc. beat analysts’ expectations in the first quarter of the year, delivering strong growth in its credit portfolio while its Argentina division saw a boost as the country removed trade barriers and scrapped currency controls.】

item.title: 各州起诉特朗普停止电动汽车充电器计划
item.description: 加利福尼亚州总检察长表示，该州和其他 16 个州正在起诉唐纳德-特朗普总统暂停一项 50 亿美元的电动汽车充电器联邦资助计划，认为他上任以来削减美国对插电式汽车补贴的指令是非法的。【原文：California’s attorney general said his state and 16 others are suing President Donald Trump for suspending a $5 billion federal funding program for electric car chargers, arguing his directives to slash US subsidies for plug-in vehicles since taking office are unlawful.】

item.title: Arm 预测不温不火，芯片制造商更加谨慎
item.description: Arm Holdings Plc 对本期销售额的预测乏善可陈，称新授权协议的时间安排使这家芯片公司对其预测持谨慎态度。【原文：Arm Holdings Plc gave a lackluster sales forecast for the current period, saying that the timing of new licensing agreements has made the chip company cautious about its predictions.】

item.title: 绿点公司股价因私募股权投资兴趣报告而大涨
item.description: 在《财富》援引未具名银行和私募股权投资公司高管的话报道了这家金融科技公司吸引了私募股权投资兴趣之后，Green Dot 公司的股价最高跃升了 7.3%，创下自 4 月 9 日以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Green Dot Corp. shares jump as much as 7.3%, the most intraday since April 9, after Fortune reported that the financial technology company had attracted private equity interest, citing unnamed banking and PE executives.】

item.title: 美国空军寻求加快交付特朗普的飞机
item.description: 美国空军官员表示，随着唐纳德-特朗普总统对在其第二个任期结束前获得一架重新设计的飞机越来越不耐烦，美国空军正在推动加快交付新的空军一号。【原文：The US Air Force is pushing to speed the delivery of the new Air Force One, service officials said, as President Donald Trump grows more impatient about getting a redesigned plane before his second term ends.】

item.title: 就人工智能规则展开辩论后，特朗普将取消芯片禁令
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，特朗普政府计划废除拜登时代的人工智能芯片限制措施，作为修改半导体贸易限制措施的更广泛努力的一部分。【原文：The Trump administration plans to rescind Biden-era AI chip curbs as part of a broader effort to revise semiconductor trade restrictions that have drawn strong opposition from major tech companies and foreign governments, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国消费者借贷增幅为三个月来最大，广泛回升
item.description: 3 月份美国消费者借贷增长幅度为三个月来最大，反映出信用卡余额增加以及机动车和其他非循环贷款的稳健增长。【原文：US consumer borrowing increased in March by the most in three months, reflecting a pickup in credit-card balances as well as a solid rise in motor vehicle and other non-revolving loans.】

item.title: 美联储利率决议和鲍威尔简报的要点如下
item.description: 以下是联邦公开市场委员会利率决定和美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔周三新闻发布会的主要内容：【原文：Here are the key takeaways from the Federal Open Market Committee’s interest-rate decision and Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s news conference Wednesday:】

item.title: 纽约 MTA 获得由拥堵收费收入支持的 5 亿美元贷款
item.description: 根据一份贷款文件显示，在特朗普政府试图终止收费项目之际，纽约大都会运输局与一组投资者达成了一项 5 亿美元的贷款协议，由拥堵收费收入提供支持。【原文：New York’s Metropolitan Transportation Authority entered into a $500 million loan agreement with a group of investors that’s backed by congestion pricing revenue as the Trump administration tries to end the tolling program, according to a loan document.】

item.title: APA 接近以 6.25 亿美元向二叠纪资源公司出售资产
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，从埃及到阿拉斯加都有油井的美国石油勘探公司APA Corp.正接近达成一项交易，将其在全球最繁忙的页岩区的部分资产出售给Permian Resources Corp.，以精简其投资组合。【原文：APA Corp., a US oil explorer with wells from Egypt to Alaska, is nearing a deal to sell some of its assets in the world’s busiest shale patch to Permian Resources Corp. as it streamlines its portfolio, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 穆迪因贸易担忧下调美国机场展望
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将美国机场行业的前景展望从稳定调整为负面，理由是全球贸易战预计将对航空旅行造成冲击。【原文：Moody’s Ratings has revised its outlook for the US airport sector to negative from stable, citing an expected hit to air travel from the global trade war as a key reason for its view.】

item.title: 不，美联储不会救助特朗普（或股市）
item.description: 股票市场已经嗅到了这一点：唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）要达成贸易协议的压力太大了，他认为关税不会从 "解放日 "宣传的高水平上下降。问题在于，这些协议是否来得太迟太少，如果是，美联储是否会为总统解围。【原文：Equity markets have already sniffed it out: The pressure on Donald Trump to make trade deals is too great to think tariffs won’t come down from the lofty levels advertised on “Liberation Day.” The question is whether the deals come too little too late — and if so, whether the Federal Reserve will bail out the president.】

item.title: 贝索斯支持的公司签署协议推进刚果锂矿开采
item.description: KoBold Metals Co.已达成初步商业协议，将在刚果民主共和国开发世界上最大的硬岩锂矿之一。【原文：KoBold Metals Co. has reached a preliminary commercial agreement to move forward with development of one of the world’s biggest hard rock lithium deposits, in the Democratic Republic of Congo.】

item.title: 美联储称美国经济前景不明，美国国债上涨
item.description: 在美联储维持利率稳定，同时强调通胀上升和失业率上升的风险越来越大之后，国债市场走高。【原文：The Treasury market edged higher after the Federal Reserve held interest rates steady while emphasizing growing risks of higher inflation and rising unemployment.】

item.title: Robinhood 计划用区块链在欧洲交易美国资产
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，Robinhood Markets 公司正在开发一个基于区块链的平台，该平台将允许欧洲的散户投资者交易股票等美国证券。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc. is developing a blockchain-based platform that will allow retail investors in Europe to trade US securities such as stocks, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 支付公司 AvidXchange 因 TPG 和 Corpay 的收购而大涨
item.description: AvidXchange 控股公司与 TPG 公司和 Corpay 公司达成价值 22 亿美元的私有化交易后，该公司股价周三最高上涨了 19%。【原文：AvidXchange Holdings Inc.’s shares rose as much as 19% Wednesday after the payments company struck a go-private deal with TPG Inc. and Corpay Inc. worth $2.2 billion.】

item.title: 官员称墨西哥经济放缓为墨西哥银行下调主要利率提供空间
item.description: 墨西哥央行副行长乔纳森-希思（Jonathan Heath）表示，随着墨西哥经济放缓，经济衰退的几率增加，墨西哥央行仍有继续下调基准利率的空间。【原文：Mexico’s central bank has room to continue cutting its benchmark interest rate as the country’s economy slows and the odds of a recession increase, according to Deputy Governor Jonathan Heath.】

item.title: 美联储维持利率不变，认为存在通胀和失业率上升的风险
item.description: 美联储官员连续第三次会议保持利率稳定，并强调他们认为通胀上升和失业率上升的风险都在增加。【原文：Federal Reserve officials held interest rates steady for a third-straight meeting and emphasized they see a growing risk of both higher inflation and rising unemployment.】

item.title: 特朗普称不会为启动谈判而降低对华关税
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统说，他不愿意先发制人地降低对中国的关税，以便与中国政府就贸易问题展开更具实质性的谈判。【原文：President Donald Trump said he’s unwilling to preemptively lower tariffs on China in order to unlock more substantive negotiations with Beijing on trade.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚将实行财政透明以重获信任
item.description: 哥伦比亚公共信贷部主任表示，哥伦比亚计划更加公开地公布其公共财政的真实状况，以重新赢得投资者的信任，从而降低借贷成本。【原文：Colombia plans to be more open about the true state of its public finances in a bid to regain investor trust and thereby cut borrowing costs, according to the nation’s director of public credit.】

item.title: 比亚迪、青山集团放弃智利锂加工项目
item.description: 在电池金属价格暴跌之后，两家中国公司放弃了在智利开发锂加工项目的计划，这破坏了智利为其矿产出口增加更多价值的努力。【原文：Two Chinese companies dropped plans to develop lithium-processing projects in Chile after the price of the battery metal tumbled, undermining the nation’s bid to add more value to its mineral exports.】

item.title: Pegasus 间谍软件判决对长期批评者来说是 "难以置信的时刻
item.description: 以色列萨皮尔阿拉瓦沙漠中的 NSO 集团分部。 摄影师：Amir Levy/Getty Images【原文：A NSO Group branch in the Arava Desert in Sapir, Israel. Photographer: Amir Levy/Getty Images】

item.title: 越南称希望在贸易谈判开始之际从美国购买更多商品
item.description: 越南周三表示，希望本国企业以稳定的步伐大量购买更多高价值的美国进口商品，重申了其与华盛顿贸易谈判的开场白，即避免惩罚性的高关税。【原文：Vietnam said Wednesday that it wants its companies to buy more high-value US imports in large volumes and at a stable pace, reaffirming its opening line on trade talks with Washington to avoid punishingly high tariffs.】

item.title: 坦桑尼亚限制美元使用以支撑非洲最差货币
item.description: 坦桑尼亚已限制在所有本地交易中使用外汇，以支撑先令。【原文：Tanzania has curbed the use of foreign-exchange in all local transactions to prop up the shilling.】

item.title: 尼日利亚参议员批准蒂努布的税收法案，但不增加增值税
item.description: 尼日利亚参议员周三支持博拉-蒂努布总统为增加政府收入而提出的四项税收法案，但与国民议会下院的议员们一起否决了他提高增值税税率的计划。【原文：Nigerian senators on Wednesday backed four tax bills that are part of President Bola Tinubu’s efforts to lift government revenue, but joined lawmakers in the lower National Assembly in rejecting his plan to increase the value-added tax rate.】

item.title: 瑞银因贸易动荡将债券和贷款销售前景下调 2,350 亿美元
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）下调了对今年美国企业债发行量的预期，理由是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）推出的关税政策带来了波动，而且交易速度低于预期。【原文：UBS Group AG lowered its forecast for US corporate debt issuance this year, citing volatility tied to President Donald Trump’s tariff rollout and a slower-than-expected pace of dealmaking.】

item.title: 美联储利率决议、鲍威尔新闻发布会分析
item.description: 杰罗姆-鲍威尔摄影师：阿尔-德拉戈/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Jerome Powell Photographer: Al Drago/Bloomberg】

item.title: 对冲基金艾斯勒裁员 15%，全面改革削减成本
item.description: 艾斯勒资本公司（Eisler Capital）已经解雇了约 15%的员工，因为该公司希望在资产减少和交易亏损的情况下降低成本。【原文：Eisler Capital has dismissed about 15% of its workforce as it looks to reduce costs amid declining assets and trading losses.】
